languages.text: "О! Не верю, что Дикарь посмеет ошпарить Лорд-капитана. Не должен".
"Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."
languages.original_text: "О! Не верю, что Дикарь посмеет ошпарить Лорд-капитана. Не должен".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare to scald he Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

languages.text: «Oh, no creo que Salvaje se atreva a chamuscar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. No le conviene, desde luego».
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, no creo que Salvaje se atreva a chamuscar a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. No le conviene, desde luego».

languages.text: 「サベージがロード・キャプテンを傷つけるなんて、信じられない。そんなことは絶対にやってはいけない」
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

traits.locale_text: 「サベージがロード・キャプテンを傷つけるなんて、信じられない。そんなことは絶対にやってはいけない」

languages.text: “噢，我可不相信萨维奇会烫伤舰长大人，这种事情它绝对不该干。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

traits.locale_text: “噢，我可不相信萨维奇会烫伤舰长大人，这种事情它绝对不该干。”

languages.text: "Oh, ich weigere mich, zu glauben, dass Wild es wagen würde, den Lord Captain zu verbrennen. Das sollte er definitiv nicht tun."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ich weigere mich, zu glauben, dass Wild es wagen würde, den Lord Captain zu verbrennen. Das sollte er definitiv nicht tun."

languages.text: « Oh, je refuse de croire que Sauvage oserait s'en prendre {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Ce serait terriblement malvenu de sa part. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, je refuse de croire que Sauvage oserait s'en prendre {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine}. Ce serait terriblement malvenu de sa part. »

languages.text: "Hah, Hoyrat'ın Lord Kaptan'ı haşlamaya cüret edeceğine inanmayı reddediyorum. Kesinlikle yapmamalı."
languages.original_text: "Oh, I refuse to believe Savage would dare scald the Lord Captain. He definitely should not."
